BMERLIQA.MX.summary: The aim of BMERLIQ is offering investors the option to invest in securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government, the Bank of Mexico, as well as state and local governments Credit institutions, corporate, domestic and foreign denominated in pesos and / or UDI, live, repurchase or through debt mutual funds.
